description: Locking an instance prevents normal migration from occurring, but does not prevent live migration. AFAICT there is no reason not to be consistent here and also stop live migration from occurring if the instance has been locked

commit 83e1f53a99dc504d95ccac29375dd38210c6acbf
Author: Chris Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Dec 3 15:01:23 2013 +1030

    Adds instance lock check for live migrate
    
    Whilst migrate has an instance locked check, live migrate didn't. This patch
    adds a check to see if the instance is locked in the compute api live migrate.
    
    Adds a testcase for V3 and generic instance lock checking for the V2 API since
    none existed yet.
    
    Closes-bug: 1257187
